tosdr.case: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services

title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
quoteText: n posting User Content to the site, you are basically granting to Virgin.com Â and Virgin Unite an irrevocable, perpetual, royalty-free, non-exclusive, worldwide, transferable licence to publish, display, copy, modify, create derivative works from and distribute the User Content on the site.
